alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 12:35PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Wakulla, south central Gadsden, central Liberty and southwestern Leon Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1235 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles east of Stonemill Creek to 13 miles southwest of Crawfordville. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bristol, Sopchoppy, Telogia, East Camp, Jewel Fire Tower, Brown House, Vilas, Hosford, Jensen Place, Central City, Sanborn, Clio, Poplar Camp, Smith Creek, Lowry, Nixon Garden, Bloxham, Twin Pole and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
